thread.title: Vickie

author: Vickie
title: Vickie
text: I had went and ordered a Gown for my niece for her Sr. Prom . The Boutique called and said they couldn't get it , and weren't making this gown anymore . She was so disappointed . I got online n started shopping . I found it n was so excited they said we'd have it in 5 to 7 days ! I get n email that it was t being cut anymore. My sister called and said she found it with you all and had spoke with your team n had plenty in stock !!!! I paid and we have the gown in hand !! N in less than a week !! You made my niece one happy girl for her Sr. Prom coming up . Thank you
